column2: "Are you an ARKS member? Are you willing to accept my request?"
"Thank you so much. You're really a life saver!"
"I'm a research student studying the formation of the planets. It just that I can't find much data on Naberius."
"It's the first planet ARKS go to for training, and yet there's very little information available on it."
"Sorry, I got caught up in thought. My name is Rogio."
"The content of my request is very simple: a geological survey of Naberius."
"I have a hunch that I really want to look into."
"Even when I ask other ARKS members, they don't seem to think there's anything new to be learned about Naberius."
"And then you came along, <%me>. Thank you so much!"
"Please, whenever you have the time is fine!"
